data.title: Is Vendor Prefixing Dead?
data.description: Browser vendors slowly began to move away from prefixing in 2012. It appeared that the problems created by vendor prefixes would fade away in time. The question is: has that time come yet?

data.title: Getting Deep Into Shadows
data.description: In web design, using light and shadow can add physical realism and can be used to make rich, tactile interfaces. Let's explore where and when we can use shadows.
